tool_description:
Indeed Jobs API - Sweden
Get the Jobs List as JSON by giving Keyword, Location (Sweden Only) and offset value.
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.
title: Indeed Jobs API - Sweden

api_list.name: SearchJobs
api_list.description:
offset = 0 (starting of the page, it must be increased by 10 to achieve pagination)
keyword = python (it can be any search keyword for ex: job title or skill title)
location = Stockholm (For now this API gets data for Sweden Indeed. You can enter a specific city or state.)
This will provide you with a list of 15 jobs in the page, by default a single page can have a max of 15 jobs posting only. In order to get all the data using pagination you need to keep increasing the count of offset by 10.

You will get the following fields using this API.

'position'
'company_name'
'job_title'
'job_location'
'salary'
'date'
'job_url'
'urgently_hiring'
'multiple_hiring'
'company_rating'
'company_reviews'
'company_review_link'
'company_logo_url'
'page_number'

utterances.utterance: Find software developer jobs in Gothenburg starting from the first page.
Show me data analyst positions in Malmö, starting from page 2.
Search for marketing manager roles in Uppsala from the third page.
Get the latest project manager job listings in Stockholm, starting from page 4.
Look for graphic designer opportunities in Lund, starting from the fifth page.
Find teaching positions in Linköping, starting from page 6.
Show me the available nurse jobs in Västerås, starting from the seventh page.
Search for electrician job openings in Örebro, starting from page 8.
Get the list of accountant jobs in Helsingborg, starting from the ninth page.
Look for available chef positions in Jönköping, starting from page 10.
